name: Vesk
appearance: Moon-iron earring, sharkhide vest, sun-cracked lips, one eye milk-pale on moonless nights from iron dust.
character: Cocky, mercurial, and too quick to draw a blade when bored.
talents: reads surf to find hidden cuts through reef
flaws: fears his memory slips when wearing moon-iron too long
dreams: Force better tribute terms without blood
Retire with enough coin to forget bad tides
secrets: Occasionally takes coin from Selka’s envoys to ‘cool’ demands
Has a child in Dorsalhaven he visits in disguise
Night-blindness grows worse; he hides it from his crew
